sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0350 ( DPOB_CD , REATTY_YR , PAY_CD , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , REATTY_DDLNE_DT , REATTY_DDLNE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #reattyYr# , #payCd# , #reattyStpDsptyNum# , #systemkey# , #reattyApptnSumJan# , #reattyApptnSumFeb# , #reattyApptnSumMar# , #reattyApptnSumApr# , #reattyApptnSumMay# , #reattyApptnSumJun# , #reattyApptnSumJul# , #reattyApptnSumAug# , #reattyApptnSumSep# , #reattyApptnSumOct# , #reattyApptnSumNov# , #reattyApptnSumDec# , #reattyApptnSumAggr# , #reattyItemNoteCtnt# , #reattyPymtYrMnth# , #reattyPymtPrcsYn# , #reattyDdlneDt# , #reattyDdlneYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0350 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# , PAY_CD=#payCd# , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN=#reattyApptnSumJan# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB=#reattyApptnSumFeb# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR=#reattyApptnSumMar# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR=#reattyApptnSumApr# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY=#reattyApptnSumMay# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN=#reattyApptnSumJun# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL=#reattyApptnSumJul# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG=#reattyApptnSumAug# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP=#reattyApptnSumSep# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT=#reattyApptnSumOct# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV=#reattyApptnSumNov# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC=#reattyApptnSumDec# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR=#reattyApptnSumAggr# , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT=#reattyItemNoteCtnt# , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH=#reattyPymtYrMnth# , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN=#reattyPymtPrcsYn# , REATTY_DDLNE_DT=#reattyDdlneDt# , REATTY_DDLNE_YN=#reattyDdlneYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM PAYR0350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , REATTY_YR , PAY_CD , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , REATTY_DDLNE_DT , REATTY_DDLNE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , REATTY_YR , PAY_CD , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , REATTY_DDLNE_DT , REATTY_DDLNE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
REATTY_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , REATTY_YR DESC , PAY_CD DESC , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
REATTY_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.REATTY_YR , AA.PAY_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , AA.REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , AA.REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_DT , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_YN , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM ,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM ,NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD ,BB.BUSIN_CD ,fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.BUSIN_CD,1,4),BB.DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,fcBass0400CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'2') AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0350 AA, PSNL0100 BB,PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND AA.PAY_CD=#payCd# AND AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.REATTY_YR DESC , AA.PAY_CD DESC , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM DESC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD) ASC , BB.RESN_REGN_NUM ASC , AA.SYSTEMKEY ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.REATTY_YR , AA.PAY_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , AA.REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , AA.REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_DT , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_YN , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM ,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM ,NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD ,BB.BUSIN_CD ,fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.BUSIN_CD,1,4),BB.DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,fcBass0400CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'2') AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0350 AA, PSNL0100 BB,PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND AA.PAY_CD=#payCd# AND AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )

SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.REATTY_YR , AA.PAY_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , AA.REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , AA.REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_DT , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_YN , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM ,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM ,NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD ,BB.BUSIN_CD ,fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.BUSIN_CD,1,4),BB.DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,fcBass0400CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'2') AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0350 AA, PSNL0100 BB,PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
BB.MANGE_DEPT_CD = #mangeDeptCd#
AA.PAY_CD=#payCd#
AA.REATTY_APPTN_YR_MNTH = #reattyApptnYrMnth#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
BB.systemkey=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM(+) LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.REATTY_YR , AA.PAY_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , AA.REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , AA.REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_DT , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_YN , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM ,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM ,NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD ,BB.BUSIN_CD ,fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.BUSIN_CD,1,4),BB.DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,fcBass0400CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'2') AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM ,DD.REATTY_APPTN_YR_MNTH FROM PAYR0350 AA, PSNL0100 BB,PAYR0500 CC , PAYR0360 DD WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=DD.DPOB_CD AND AA.REATTY_YR=DD.REATTY_YR AND AA.PAY_CD=DD.PAY_CD AND AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=DD.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.PAY_CD=#payCd#
DD.REATTY_APPTN_YR_MNTH = #reattyApptnYrMnth#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
BB.systemkey=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM(+) LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
BB.DEPT_CD = #mangeDeptCd#
BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.REATTY_YR DESC , AA.PAY_CD DESC , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM DESC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD) ASC , BB.RESN_REGN_NUM ASC , AA.SYSTEMKEY ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.REATTY_YR , AA.PAY_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , AA.REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , AA.REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_DT , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_YN , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM ,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD ,fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM ,NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD ,BB.BUSIN_CD ,fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.BUSIN_CD,1,4),BB.DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,fcBass0400CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'2') AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM ,DD.REATTY_APPTN_YR_MNTH FROM PAYR0350 AA, PSNL0100 BB,PAYR0500 CC , PAYR0360 DD WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=DD.DPOB_CD AND AA.REATTY_YR=DD.REATTY_YR AND AA.PAY_CD=DD.PAY_CD AND AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=DD.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.PAY_CD=#payCd#
DD.REATTY_APPTN_YR_MNTH = #reattyApptnYrMnth#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
BB.systemkey=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM(+) LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
BB.DEPT_CD = #mangeDeptCd#
BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.REATTY_YR , AA.PAY_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , AA.REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , AA.REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_DT , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_YN FROM PAYR0350 AA, PSNL0100 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND AA.PAY_CD=#payCd# AND AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.REATTY_YR DESC , AA.PAY_CD DESC , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM DESC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD) ASC , BB.RESN_REGN_NUM ASC , AA.SYSTEMKEY ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.REATTY_YR , AA.PAY_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PAY_CD) AS PAY_NM , AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , AA.REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , AA.REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , AA.REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_DT , AA.REATTY_DDLNE_YN FROM PAYR0350 AA, PSNL0100 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND AA.PAY_CD=#payCd# AND AA.REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )
